data.text:
#Gimp for mac os x 10.6.8 install#

!IMPORTANT! ⚠️ App Store: GIMP team does not.

Supported OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or newer If the mirrors do not work or you would rather download directly from our server, you can get the direct download here. The download links above will attempt to download GIMP Please refer to the documentation for your Unix-like system on the installation of software. GIMP can also run on Solaris and is available for the BSD family of systems such as FreeBSD and OpenBSD.
